data_table.description: Form 33 - Medical History Update of Faints, Falls, Exams, Tests and Procedures -- hospitalization since last contact; hospitalization for heart, circulatory, or coagulation problems; stroke or transient ischemic attack, number of falls or syncopal episodes, fractures update; cancer (type, where diagnosed, hospitalization); mammogram; breast biopsy, needle aspiration, or lumpectomy; tests and procedures; electrocardiogram; diagnosis of new conditions; hip or other joint replacement. This form is also used to manage major health effects and events and to monitor adverse effects. This dataset now also includes data collected from Extension form 33s. Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#.

variable.name: F33VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F33WHOM
variable.comment:
Who is completing this form Not collected on very early versions of Form 33 used in the Main WHI Study._x000D_
Response values '2-Family or friend' and '3-Health care provider' are not options on the Form 33 version used in the WHI Extension 2.

variable.name: F33FAINT
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, have you fainted, blacked out, or lost consiousness? Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: F33FALLS
variable.description: F33 Times Fallen collected in the WHI Main Study
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, how many times did you fall and land on the floor or ground? Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the first WHI Extension.

variable.name: F33FALLSX2
variable.description: F33 Times Fallen collected in WHI Extension 2
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, how many times did you fall and land on the floor or ground? Do not include falls due to sports.

variable.name: PHYSEXAM
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Physical exam or check up Not collected on very early versions of Form 33 used in the Main WHI Study._x000D_
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: EYEEXAM
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Eye exam Not collected on very early versions of Form 33 used in the Main WHI Study._x000D_
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: BRSTEXAM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Breast exam

variable.name: MAMMOGRM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Mammogram

variable.name: BRSTBPSY
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Test of breast tissue or fluid for disease (Breast biopsy or aspiration)

variable.name: BRSTOTH
variable.description: F33 Other breast examintation tests such as MRI
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Other breast examination tests such as MRI or ultrasound Not collected on versions of Form 33 used prior to the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: RCTLEXAM
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Rectal exam Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extension 2.

variable.name: HEMOCLT
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Test for the presence of blood in your stool or bowel movement (Hemoccult, guaiac)

variable.name: FLEXSIG
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Tube inserted into your bowel from below to check for bowel problems (Sigmoidoscopy, flex. sig., or colonoscopy)

variable.name: BARIUM
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Barium enema x-ray Not collected on very early versions of Form 33 used in the Main WHI Study._x000D_
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extension 2.

variable.name: BPCHECK
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Blood pressure check Not collected on very early versions of Form 33 used in the Main WHI Study._x000D_
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: CHOLCHK
variable.comment:
Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Blood cholesterol test Not collected on very early versions of Form 33 used in the Main WHI Study._x000D_
Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: ECG
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Electrocardiogram (ECG) Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: PAPSMR
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Pap smear Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extensions.

variable.name: DANDC
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Dilation and Curettage (D and C, womb scrape) Not collected on versions of Form 33 used in the WHI Extension 2.

variable.name: ENDOBPSY
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Endometrial biopsy

variable.name: HYSTEREC
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Removal of the uterus or womb (Hysterectomy)

variable.name: BONEDENS
variable.comment: Since your last medical update, which of the following exams, tests, or procedures have you had: Bone density scan (e.g. DEXA) Not collected on versions of Form 33 used prior to the WHI Extensions.
